item.title: Checking Modified Files in a Commit
item.description: Get the commit-hash (e.g. of last commit) git log -1 Show the files changed only in commit git show --stat <commit-hash> See details in https://stackoverflow.com/questions/424071/how-to-list-all-the-files-in-a-commit
